ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = $Label.DS_QuoteEditRecordTypeId, $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", OR(ISPICKVAL( LOA_Status__c , "G4 Submission"),ISPICKVAL( LOA_Status__c , "Approved")), Prices_Aligned__c =FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c,"In Review" ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change Approval Stage from "Draft" to "Approved"
